definitions.definition: A bordure that runs around the outline of a shield without touching the edge.
The wreath , or chaplet , surmounting or encircling the helmet of a knight and bearing the crest ; a torse .
A fillet under the ovolo of a capital .

main_definition: ( heraldry ) A bordure that runs around the outline of a shield without touching the edge.
secondary_definitions: ( heraldry ) The wreath , or chaplet , surmounting or encircling the helmet of a knight and bearing the crest ; a torse .
( architecture ) A fillet under the ovolo of a capital .
